Description: Aljazira Takaful Taawuni Co (known as: Jazira Takaful) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2013.Jazira Takaful operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. Jazira Takaful is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2013.
